mapper.select: select * from valve_status order by num desc limit 10;
mapper.update: update valve_status set sw1 = 1, on_sw1=now(), sw1_onLimit=DATE_ADD(now(), INTERVAL 300 second ) where num = #{num}
update valve_status set sw1 = 0, off_sw1=now(), valve_time = TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND, on_sw1, off_sw1), sw1_onLimit=null where num = #{num}
update valve_status set sw2 = 1, on_sw2=now(), sw2_onLimit=DATE_ADD(now(), INTERVAL 300 second ) where num = #{num}
update valve_status set sw2 = 0, off_sw2=now(), cork_time = TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND, on_sw2, off_sw2), sw2_onLimit=null where num = #{num}
mapper.select: select TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND, on_sw1, off_sw1) from valve_status where num=#{num}
select TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND, on_sw2, off_sw2) from valve_status where num=#{num}
